trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of settings for voice properties such as <xref uid="langword_csharp_Pitch" name="Pitch" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rate" name="Rate" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Volume" name="Volume" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示語音內容設定的集合，例如<xref uid="langword_csharp_Pitch" name="Pitch" href=""> </xref>， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rate" name="Rate" href=""> </xref>和<xref uid="langword_csharp_Volume" name="Volume" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The `Prosody` class represents a collection of voice properties on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object.
trans-unit.target: `Prosody`類別上所代表的語音屬性集合<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>物件。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>

trans-unit.source: The `FragmentState` object is returned in the `State` property on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> object.
Constructs a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Prosody" name="Prosody" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建構的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_Prosody" name="Prosody" href=""></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the duration of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref> in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的持續時間<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>以毫秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: A value in milliseconds for the desired time to speak the text.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒為單位的文字的讀出所需的時間值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array containing the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContourPoints" name="ContourPoints" href=""></xref> of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此陣列包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_ContourPoints" name="ContourPoints" href=""></xref>的<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array containing the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContourPoints" name="ContourPoints" href=""></xref> of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此陣列包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_ContourPoints" name="ContourPoints" href=""></xref>的<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the baseline pitch of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的基準音高<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pitch range of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定點數範圍<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking rate of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定說話射<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContourPoints" name="ContourPoints" href=""></xref> of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContourPoints" name="ContourPoints" href=""></xref> of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A byte array of <xref uid="langword_csharp_ContourPoint " name="ContourPoint " href=""></xref>objects.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列的<xref uid="langword_csharp_ContourPoint " name="ContourPoint " href=""></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking volume (loudness) of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的讀出音量 （聲音大小） <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextFragment" name="TextFragment" href=""> </xref>。
